title: Trump Launches Genesis Mission to Revolutionize AI
description: President Donald Trump has signed an executive order to establish the Genesis Mission, an initiative aimed at using federal scientific datasets to boost artificial intelligence development and accelerate scientific innovation through integrated AI platforms.
content: In a significant move towards enhancing artificial intelligence, President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Monday to initiate the Genesis Mission, a comprehensive government-wide effort. This initiative is set to establish an integrated AI ... [833 chars]

title: Trump aims to boost AI innovation, build platform to harness government data
description: President Donald Trump on Monday signed an executive order to launch a government-wide effort to build an integrated artificial intelligence platform to harness federal scientific datasets to train next-generation technologies.
content:
Nov 24 (Reuters) - President Donald Trump on Monday signed an executive order to launch a government-wide effort to build an integrated artificial intelligence platform to harness federal scientific datasets to train next-generation technologies.

title: Trump Signs ‘Genesis Mission’ Order to Boost Innovation With AI
description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Monday establishing the “Genesis Mission,” a federal effort to boost innovation using artificial intelligence — the latest step by the administration to promote AI technology and its adoption.
content:
President Donald Trump signed an executive order Monday establishing the “Genesis Mission,” a federal effort to boost innovation using artificial intelligence — the latest step by the administration to promote AI technology and its adoption.

title: Zoom Communications lifts annual outlook on accelerated demand for AI tools in hybrid work
description: Zoom Communications raised its annual revenue and profit forecast on Monday, benefiting from hybrid work trends and the integration of artificial intelligence into its products.
content:
Shares of the company were up 3.7% in extended trading.

title: Are AI-powered toys safe for children?
description: Consumer watchdog Public Interest Research Group released their Trouble in Toyland 2025 report detailing toxic toys, choking hazards and potentially dangerous artificial intelligence applications marketed for children, the report stated.
content: One stuffed bear intended for children, powered by artificial intelligence, offered researchers detailed instructions on how to light a match, where to find a knife and different types of kinks. Another toy encouraged addictive behavior, researchers ... [3520 chars]

title: AI stock gains boost California revenue by $11 billion
description: A surge in artificial intelligence stock prices has boosted California’s tax collections by about $11 billion, yet the state’s deficit is still on track to swell to about $18 billion next fiscal year, officials said.
content:
A surge in artificial intelligence stock prices has boosted California’s tax collections by about $11 billion, yet the state’s deficit is still on track to swell to about $18 billion next fiscal year, officials said.

title: North Dakota’s Grand Farm Earns Another $7 Million in State Funding
description: North Dakota is investing $7 million into Grand Farm to promote research on robotics, artificial intelligence, and other technology for autonomous agriculture.
content:

North Dakota is investing $7 million into Grand Farm to promote research on robotics, artificial intelligence, and other technology for autonomous agriculture.

title: Amazon to invest $15 billion in Indiana to boost data center infrastructure
description: Amazon.com is planning to invest about $15 billion in Northern Indiana to build data center campuses, the tech giant said as it looks to boost its cloud computing capacity to support booming artificial intelligence demand.
content:
The new data center project, which comes on top of an $11 billion outlay announced last year, will add 2.4 gigawatts of capacity in the region, Amazon said on Monday. It is also expected to create 1,100 jobs.
